posts.post_content: I have a raw “both hands showing” Hughie Jennings in F-G shape with a back particular stamp.  A certain back stamp collector is very interested in acquiring it, from me.  We are trying to find a comparable Jennings, he can purchase to replace the one in my PC. If you can be of assistance, please reply.

Here's a Polar Bear.
Asking $140.

[IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=1364&pictureid=33143[/IMG]

[IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=1364&pictureid=33144[/IMG]

Ben

Successful transactions with: Casey2296, Jacklitsch, wolf441, shepbuckman, seablaster, Bridwell. brianp-beme, hatchetman325, quinnsryche, joejo20, Brian Van Horn, Thromdog, Webster, shammus, asphaltman, old baseball, obcmac, sb1, tiger8mush, BKaufmann, 53toppscollector.
Please hold for us.  I am contacting the back collector that wants mine.  Looks like a good match for our trade.

posts.post_title: Done deal. Sending you a PM
posts.post_content: I’ll include the name and address of the original poster who this card needs to go to and get your PayPal info from you. Thanks for helping get this trade out together.

[quote name="Kltcb" post=2213816]Please hold for us.  I am contacting the back collector that wants mine.  Looks like a good match for our trade.[/QUOTE]

Ken (Kltcb) and Ed,
it was a pleasure having a good ol' fashioned baseball card trade with y'all!
Brings back to me the fun from childhood days.
We closed the deal and made some new friends in the process.

If not for Leon's awesome platform here, we would be deprived this cool, old-school pleasure.

I will keep an eye out for back stamps when I carouse Ed.
And Ken, welcome to a most excellent world!

Ben
"I love baseball history backstory; especially when it involves cards."
